title: 如何让时间锁定在午夜
author: Aezning

replies.author: xukarhei
replies.txt_content: 在午夜的时候输入/gamerule doDaylightCycle false就可以了

replies.author: lxg1992
replies.txt_content: 先把时间调到午夜  然后命令方块输/gamerule doDaylightCycle false关闭时间交替

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content:
会用命令方块但不会用help指令?2333
直接输入某个指令而不带后续参数回车
游戏会回显使用方法233

replies.author: Herobrine
replies.txt_content: 我会告诉你我不知道么
